column6:
As super-villains flood the Canadian border, Omega Flight begins to cement its team of heroes. A new character is added to the ranks as U.S. Agent saves Toronto from the powerful and beautiful (well, powerful anyway...) Daisy!,2007,5
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
